Definition: To complete this task, you must judge whether two coordinated clausal conjoints have been inverted or not (for example, for, nor, but, or, so). Inversion would result in the sentence sounding unnatural. Label the sentence as "Original" or "Inversion" based on your judgment.

Positive Examples.explanation: The sentence don't have any inversion.
